alert.note: Alert for West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 1:27AM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada, including Interstate 80 over Donner Pass, Highway 50 over Echo Summit, and Highway 88 over Carson Pass. * WHEN...Through 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible from travel delays, snow covered roads, chain controls, reduced visibility at times, and possible road closures. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels around 4500-6500 feet. Heaviest amounts expected above 6000 feet. Snow rates of 1-2 inches per hour.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
